abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo announces special election in April to fill four State Legislature openings; two vacancies were caused by convictions of former Assembly speaker Sheldon Silver and former Senate majority leader Dean G Skelos.

headline.print_headline: April Election Is Announced for Vacancies in Albany
headline.main: Special Election Is Set for April to Fill Seats Left Vacant in Albany

snippet: An election will be held on April 19 to fill four vacancies in the State Legislature, including those created by the convictions of Sheldon Silver and Dean G. Skelos.
lead_paragraph: An election will be held on April 19 to fill four vacancies in the State Legislature, including those created by the convictions of Sheldon Silver and Dean G. Skelos.
